publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1290 Shona Robison: Gas Safety Recommendations—That the Parliament welcomes the review of gas safety undertaken by the Health and Safety Executive (HSE); supports the recommendations that (a) it should be compulsory for carbon monoxide detectors to be fitted in all homes, (b) landlords be required to maintain gas appliances in a safe condition and (c) the rules on dealing with emergencies be tightened, including setting legally binding time limits for call outs by gas suppliers who should face prosecution if these are breached, and, in the light of the recent fatal tragedy in Dundee caused by a gas explosion, believes that Her Majesty’s Government should implement the HSE recommendations as a matter of priority.
